Supply: Cost of electricity from supplier or Standard Service. This cost is deregulated but is based on competitive procurements and dependent on usage.
Transmission: Cost to maintain high voltage towers and lines. Regulated by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission. This charge is dependent on usage.
Local Delivery: Cost of UI to build, maintain, and repair poles, lines, and meters that deliver power from the substation. Regulated by PURA.
Public Benefits: Cost to support energy programs authorized by the state. Charge dependent on usage.
